name: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Phantom Blood
storyline:
The story is set in England i the 1880s. You are Jonathan Joestar, the only son of the noble Joestar family. Your mother
died when you were just a baby durring a carriage crash. You and your father survived because of a man named Dario Brando who came to rescue you. Years after the crash, Dario dies of illness and his son, Dio Brando, is invited to live in
your mansion. Little do you know, the moment Dio sets foot in your home, your life will change forever.
summary: A fan-made RPG about JoJo's Bizarre Adventure by Hirohiko Araki. Play as Jonathan Joestar and experience the first major arc of the series in the style of a Final Fantasy-like RPG game.
